global.text: Welcome to Herizon. Pick a world you’re curious about. I’ll guide you step by step.
This is your universe of industries. You don’t have to finish everything. Pick one that feels interesting today.

musicLab.text: Music Lab. We’re building a confident beat. Start with kick, then snare, then hats. Keep it simple.
Nice. You made a beat with structure. That’s production, not luck. Want next steps, or try another world?

pitStopLab.text: Pit Stop Lab. Your job is tradeoffs: speed, control, reliability. Watch the bars and choose one fix per stop.
You finished the run. Strategy is just decision-making with data. That’s a skill you can learn.

dealRoomLab.text: Deal Room. We’ll practice how choices change risk and control. One step at a time.
